TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit X509Certificate2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate

summary.span: 表示 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Represents an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 結構起源於 International Organization for Standardization (ISO) 工作群組。The X.509 structure originated in the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) working groups. 此結構可用來代表各種類型的資訊，包括身分識別、 權限和持有者的屬性 （權限、 年齡、 性別、 位置、 關係，等等）。This structure can be used to represent various types of information including identity, entitlement, and holder attributes (permissions, age, sex, location, affiliation, and so forth). 雖然 ISO 規格本身，在結構上的資訊最多類別設計來建立模型 Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) 公開金鑰基礎結構，X.509 (PKIX 所發出的規格中定義的使用案例) 工作群組。Although the ISO specifications are most informative on the structure itself, the class is designed to model the usage scenarios defined in specifications issued by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) Public Key Infrastructure, X.509 (PKIX) working group. 資訊的這些規格是 RFC 3280 」[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」The most informative of these specifications is RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作介面。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和更早的版本類別不會實作介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件來加密和解密檔案。The following example demonstrates how to use an object to encrypt and decrypt a file. [!code-csharp[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下列範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並會列印到主控台的各種憑證內容。The following example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立空物件，與不同的其他建構函式的這個類別使用從位元組陣列、 指標或憑證檔案的憑證資訊。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from a byte array, a pointer, or a certificate file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 目前使用者憑證存放區，只選取作用中憑證，然後可讓使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using information from a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新使用位元組陣列中的憑證資訊的物件。This constructor creates a new object using certificate information from a byte array. 位元組陣列可以是二進位 (DER) 編碼或 Base64 編碼的 X.509 資料。The byte array can be binary (DER) encoded or Base64-encoded X.509 data. 位元組陣列也可以是 PKCS7 (Authenticode) 簽署的檔案。簽章者憑證用來建立物件。The byte array can also be a PKCS7 (Authenticode) signed file; the signer certificate is used to create the object. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

span.span: An error with the certificate occurs.
For example:
- The certificate file does not exist.
- The certificate is invalid.
- The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件使用的控制代碼，Microsoft Cryptographic API 憑證內容， `PCCERT_CONTEXT`。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. 請注意，這個建構函式的立即呼叫端需要 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。Note that the immediate caller of this constructor requires unmanaged code permission. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建構函式會建立憑證內容的複本。The constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 請勿假設您傳遞至建構函式的內容結構是有效的;有已發行。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 您可以取得一份目前`PCCERT_CONTEXT`結構屬性，但它是有效的存留期間只物件。You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼解密的私密金鑰，並將它儲存到金鑰容器。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼解密的私密金鑰，並將它儲存至 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

span.span: An error with the certificate occurs.
For example:
- The certificate file does not exist.
- The certificate is invalid.
- The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件，使用位元組陣列，才能存取憑證資料和金鑰儲存旗標的密碼。This constructor creates a new object using a byte array, a password that is needed to access the certificate data, and a key storage flag. 它搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。It is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼解密的私密金鑰，並將它儲存至 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件使用的憑證檔案名稱、 密碼，才能存取憑證和金鑰儲存旗標。This constructor creates a new object using a certificate file name, a password needed to access the certificate, and a key storage flag. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`fileName`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `fileName`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定只在一個存放區相關聯的憑證。This property is set only on a certificate that is associated with a store. 如果此屬性設定，而且憑證會新增至憑證存放區，值會保存。If the property is set and the certificate is added to a certificate store, the value is persisted. 如果從存放區擷取憑證上設定屬性，就會立即保存值。If the property is set on a certificate retrieved from a store, the value is persisted immediately. X.509 存放區中封存的憑證未包含在傳回物件，除非屬性設定為`true`。In an X.509 store, archived certificates are not included in the returned object unless the property is set to `true`. 發生任何實體的封存活動時值是設定或取消。No physical archival activity occurs when the value is set or unset. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 目前使用者憑證存放區，只選取作用中憑證，然後可讓使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 v3 憑證格式中所定義的擴充功能可讓要包含在憑證中的其他資料。The extensions defined in the X.509 v3 certificate format allow additional data to be included in the certificate. 在中的 X.509 v3 定義以及在 RFC 3280 PKIX iso 定義幾個擴充功能的 「[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」A number of extensions are defined by ISO in the X.509 v3 definition as well as by PKIX in RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." 常見的延伸模組包含金鑰使用方式的相關資訊 ()，索引鍵識別項 ()，憑證原則、 撤銷資訊 （CRL 發佈點延伸模組） 和其他用途。Common extensions include information regarding key usage (), key identifiers (), certificate policies, revocation information (CRL Distribution Point extension), and other uses. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 目前使用者憑證存放區，只選取作用中憑證，然後可讓使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 好記的名稱是可以設定 X.509 憑證存放區中的屬性。Friendly names are properties in the X.509 certificate store that can be set. 它們用來讓使用者別名與憑證產生關聯，因此可以輕鬆地識別它們。They are used to enable a user to associate aliases with certificates so they can be easily identified. 如果沒有好記的名稱存在的憑證，也就是空字串 ("") 會傳回。If no friendly name exists for the certificate, an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並會列印到主控台的各種憑證內容。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來取得 X.509 憑證的未經處理位元組陣列，並填入及其相關值的物件。This method can be used to take a raw byte array of an X.509 certificate and populate the object with its associated values. 這個方法會接受位元組陣列，因為它可以用於只適用於不需要密碼，包括 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。Since this method accepts only a byte array, it can be used only for certificate types that do not require a password, including a Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificate or a PFX/PKCS12 certificate. 請注意，PFX/PKCS12 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，則會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用憑證檔案，例如檔案使用.cer 副檔名，代表 X.509 憑證，並填入檔案包含憑證的物件。This method uses a certificate file, such as a file with a .cer extension, that represents an X.509 certificate and populates the object with the certificate the file contains. 這個方法可以搭配數個憑證類型，包括 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證 PFX/PKCS12 憑證，例如 Authenticode 簽章者憑證。This method can be used with several certificate types, including Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, PFX/PKCS12 certificates, and signer certificates such as Authenticode. 請注意，PFX/PKCS12 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，則會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，例如 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。You can use this method for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 請注意，PFX/PKCS12 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，則會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來填入物件使用的位元組陣列所表示的憑證的密碼。This method can be used to populate an object using a password for the certificate represented by the byte array. 值可用來控制何處以及如何匯入私用金鑰。The value can be used to control where and how to import the private key. 這個方法會接受位元組陣列，並可用於例如 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。This method accepts a byte array and can be used for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 請注意，PFX/PKCS12 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，則會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並會列印到主控台的各種憑證內容。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. span.span: The serial number of the certificate as a big-endian hexadecimal string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 憑證的序號是原始的 X.509 通訊協定的一部分。The serial number of the certificate is part of the original X.509 protocol. 序號是由憑證簽發者，也稱為憑證授權單位 (CA) 發出的唯一號碼。The serial number is a unique number issued by the certificate issuer, which is also called the Certificate Authority (CA). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並會列印到主控台的各種憑證內容。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. summary.span: 取得憑證的指模。

The thumbprint of the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指紋使用 SHA1 演算法以動態方式產生，並且不是實際存在的憑證中。The thumbprint is dynamically generated using the SHA1 algorithm and does not physically exist in the certificate. 指紋是憑證的唯一值，因為它常用來尋找特定的憑證在憑證存放區。Since the thumbprint is a unique value for the certificate, it is commonly used to find a particular certificate in a certificate store. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並會列印到主控台的各種憑證內容。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同所有`ToString`方法，輸出可能不一致的跨版本的.NET Framework 中，因此不應針對內容剖析方法的結果。As with all `ToString` methods, the output might not be consistent across versions of the .NET Framework, so the method results should not be parsed for content. 使用屬性物件取得精確的資訊。Use the properties on the object to obtain precise information. 這個方法會以文字格式顯示的憑證。This method displays the certificate in text format. 如果`verbose`參數設為`true`，顯示的文字包含公開金鑰、 私密金鑰和延伸模組。If the `verbose` parameter is set to `true`, the text display includes the public key, private key, and extensions. 如果`verbose`設為`false`，顯示的文字包含這些欄位提供的 X.509 憑證，包括指模、 序號、 主旨和簽發者名稱和有效日期資訊。If `verbose` is set to `false`, the text display includes those fields available from the X.509 certificate, including thumbprint, serial number, subject and issuer names, and validity date information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並會列印到主控台的各種憑證內容。The following code example creates a command line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. summary.span: 使用基本驗證原則，執行 X.509 鏈結驗證。

span.span: Performs a X.509 chain validation using basic validation policy.

returns.span: 如果驗證成功，則為 ，如果驗證失敗則為 。

span.span: if the validation succeeds; if the validation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法建置簡單的鏈結的憑證，並將基底的原則套用到該鏈結。This method builds a simple chain for the certificate and applies the base policy to that chain. 如果您需要有關失敗的詳細資訊，驗證憑證直接使用物件。If you need more information about a failure, validate the certificate directly using the object. 請注意，預設的鏈結引擎可以使用覆寫類別。Note that the default chaining engine can be overridden using the class. Microsoft Windows Server 2003，預設的引擎是否符合規格述 RFC3280，「[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」On Microsoft Windows Server 2003, the default engine conforms to the specification described in RFC3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 目前使用者憑證存放區，只選取作用中憑證，然後可讓使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console.
